generated_changelog:
## What's Changed
- ITS: series of fixes and improvements including truth seeding, configuration unification, and vertexer optimizations by @FelixSchlepper
- GPU: enhancements in cluster cuts, ZS decoder, and OpenGL backend by @DavidRohr
- TrackQA and AOD: updates to track reference handling and TPC QA by @FelixSchlepper and @swenzel
- DPL: fixes for device dependency checks and circular dependencies by @ErnstHellbar and @GiulioEulisse
- TPC QA: new normalized attached counts for non-fake and all tracks by @DavidRohr
- Miscellaneous: ratio plots added to TrackClusters QA task by @AntonRiedel and position fixes for ITS3 clusters by @Fabrizio
